author: Odeinoichus
title: Disguised Candy? Or Super Pop-Star?
review:
Set #71023 Candy Rapper: This punny miss is dressed in a tutu with white and pink stripes and features a top to match, her legs are dual-moulded with white and pink as well and overall she's a very impressive looking Minifigure with some interesting ideas behind her.

Idea 1: She's a Music Star, as evidenced by her included accessories of a microphone and audio cassette.

Idea 2: She's dressed like a Candy Wrapper, hence her very punnish name since she might be a Rap Star.

Idea 3: Well there is really no idea 3, but Her hair is a very nice shade of pink, there's some excellent silver star detailing on her hair, tutu and back, and she has two awesome expressions. Smiling and Smiling with a Wink.

I would strongly recommend getting her, she's just a great, fun looking Minifigure. I know absolutely nothing about her as a character, but I love her look and wish I could have at least gotten doubles for my collection. Overall Strongly Recommended.
